Product Description

PULIVIA 2022 Upgraded Snowflake Projector Light for Christmas

Christmas Snowflake Projector Light

PULIVIA Snowflake Projector light is your perfect choice for Christmas New Year.This Christmas outdoor projector light with three types of snowflake patterns including “Large Snowflake” + “Small Snowflake” + “Snow Dots”. Snowflakes moving in rotation, create a strong sense of space.The outdoor projector light is great for holiday decoration, such as Xmas, New Year weddings, Thanksgiving, birthday parties which makes it a very popular choice.This decoration projector light is a nice gift for you family Christmas.

Christmas Projector Light Outdoor

The projector light comes with 3 Installation Methods and Working Scenarios:

Mounted on the wall for outdoor or indoor;Installed on the grass for outdoor;Place on the table for indoor.

Adjustable Projecting Angle

The Christmas projector light can be adjusted the projection angle, you can adjust it 0 – 180 degree as you need.

Waterproof IP65

PULIVIA snowflake projector lights have a waterproof function: light is IP65 and plug is IP44;The working temperature is -20℃-50℃, apply to outdoor and indoor even if rain or snow;The power adapter is not waterproof.

Package List

1 X LED Light Projector1 X Power Adapter1 X Ground Stake1 X Mounting Plate1 X Fixed Screws1 X Support Frame1 X User Manual

Specification:

Color Black Material ABS, LED Power Consumption 4W (safer than other style) Input Voltage 100-240V AC 50/60HZ Output voltage 14V/0.3A(Low Voltage, very safe) Light Source LED Light Power cord 5m/16.5ft Waterproof Grade light is IP65, Protection Grade: plug is IP44 Operating Temperature -20 °C To 50 °C

Pay Attention:

The best projection distance is 16.5 – 26ft（5-8m）.

【IP65 Waterproof and Easy to Install】— PULIVIA Christmas projector light is made of high-quality ABS material, IP65 waterproof, and the working temperature is -20℃-50℃, apply to outdoor and indoor even if rain or snow. It comes with a round base and a long ground stake, so it can be either staked in the grass or installed indoor. Ultra-long 5m/16.5ft power cable will easily reach most house outlets where you set it up.
【Indoor and Outdoor Projector Light】— PULIVIA Upgraded snowflake projector light is widely used in Halloween, Christmas, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving, bars, weddings, family gatherings, etc. Suitable for decorating your garden, house, fence, trees, etc. 7 meter cable can be easily connected and can install indoors or outdoors. The projection distance of the snow lamp is 9.8ft–65.6ft and the best projection range is 16ft—26ft.
【Brighter Clearer and Large Projection Area】— This Christmas projection light is brighter and clearer than other similar snowflake projectors. PULIVIA snowflake projector light is the good choice for your Christmas.
【Safe Projector and Beautiful Decoration】— This snowflake projection light uses high-quality LED lights, with soft and comfortable lighting. Beautiful snowflake decoration, creating a perfect Christmas atmosphere. If you have any questions about this romantic snow light, please contact us via amazon. Our customer service will reply to you within 24 hours.
